item.description:
This is a fun local race that has really grown the last few years.  The Needham Running Club does a very good job at keeping that small town local feel to the race.  Tim

Start your year off on the right foot with the Needham Running Club's New Year's Day 5K run. This run will benefit the YMCA, Needham Cultural Council and the Needham Education Foundation. Food, sports drinks, and water at race end.

New this year: Great running gloves for the first 500 entrants, cash gift certificates will be awarded to the top three runners (male and female), and several other winner categories and free raffle prizes. This race is USATF sanctioned and will be timed and snacks/water and race results will be provided after the run.

Date: January 1, 2013

Time: Race starts promptly at 11:00am. Location: Needham YMCA Pool Building at 863 Great Plain Ave, Needham

Registration:

Online Registration - Online registration can be found at RaceWire.com. Mail In Registration - Download "Mail In Registration Form" here. Same Day Registration - registration opens at 9am.

Cost: $20 in advance and $25 on race day. Send registration forms(see "Mail In Registration Form" above) to: John Pizzuto
291 Nehoiden Street
Needham, Ma 02492 (postmark before Dec 25)
(make check payable to Needham Running Club)
item.name: Needham New Years Day 5K
